§ 3813. Authorization of appropriations There are hereby authorized to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter. (Pub. L. 96–468, § 13, formerly § 14, Oct. 17, 1980, 94 Stat. 2234; renumbered § 13, Pub. L. 104–127, title IX, § 914(b)(2), Apr. 4, 1996, 110 Stat. 1186.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 13 of Pub. L. 96–468 was renumbered section 12 and is classified to section 3812 of this title.
